What is the focus of the Verus Coin Foundation?

The Verus Coin Foundation has a vision of creating a Public Blockchain as a Service (PBaaS) system, which aims to provide a decentralized and scalable platform for building blockchain-based applications.

Get involved in Verus and the Verus community:
Visit https://veruscoin.io
